sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO skt_net_schedule_action (ACTION, HASH_ID, AP_NO, TARGET_ID, HOSTNM, SUCCESS, REGDATE) VALUES(#action#, #hash_id#, #ap_no#, #target_id#, #name#, #success#,NOW())
INSERT INTO DRM_JOB (HOSTNAME, PATH, HASH_ID, TYPE) VALUES(#name#, #path#, #hash_id#, 'encrypt')
INSERT INTO pi_remediate (ACTION, TARGET_ID, AP_NO, HOSTNAME, PATH_ORIG, PATH, REGDATE) VALUES(#action#, #target_id#, #ap_no#, #name#, #path_orig#, #path#, NOW())
